page.title: 15A Day In My Life-Child,9 yrs
page.content: Yawn! Iam getting up.It is a Thursday. Oh no, it is a school day. I get up, make my bed, go downstairs & have my breakfast. Then I wash the pets, my mum goes to work & Daddy takes us to school.We play until the bell, then go to our classrooms to do the register. When we have finished Assembly we go & do some work. At playtime we have a small bottle of milk for 5p., orange, lemon or blackcurrant for 10p. or soup for 12p. When we go in after play we go into our classroom & change to a different job & we work very hard as usual.The dinner bell is at 12 p.m. Some have school dinners, some have sandwiches. ***** at 3 p.m. we say the prayer, say Good-Afternoon to our teacher & go home.***About 4.15 we go to Brownies in Landford, where we have a good time. Then we go home, have our tea & go to bed.(***=Abbreviations)
